products.title: Velvet Sky Light Blue Curtain
products.description: Their soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft curtainin sky light blue, adds a splash of light blue to your window.
